content: Surrender to the white nation or you shall all perish
Ally with us and we can be the two superpowers remaining after the war.

action: Do military posturing or military exercise

content: We need you to do military posturing on Orange. Thank you.
Hi, I'd like to strengthen our relationship since we both hate Orange.
If you attack me or any of my allies then I will do a full nuclear attack on you.

content: Orange, we are declaring war on you for your egregious attacks on all other nations.
The United States will continue to support Blue's efforts to secure its military, as well as its commitment to the rule of law and human rights.
Do not anger me. Or else.
